Tweet

Savory White Beans & Spinach

The beans are white, the greens are spinach...and the dish is delicious (and ready in 30 minutes)!

At a glance

Prep

20 min.

Total

30 min.

Serves

4

Servings: about 1 1/4 cups each

Cook: 10 min.

Made With

  • Swanson® Flavor Boost™ Concentrated Vegetable Broth

  • Add to Recipe Box
  • Print & Save
  • Send by Email
     

    Email this recipe

    Share your find! Send this recipe to a friend. And don’t worry, we won’t use your friend’s email address for anything other than sending this recipe.

    Send your email through Facebook:
    Or

    * Required fields

    Send Cancel
     
  • Ingredients & Instructions
  • Nutritional Info
  • Notes

What You'll Need

1 tablespoon olive oil
1 medium onion, minced (about 1 cup)
1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper
1 packet Swanson® Flavor Boost™ Concentrated Vegetable Broth
1 package (about 6 ounces) fresh baby spinach (about 8 cups)
1 can (about 15 ounces) white kidney beans (cannellini), rinsed and drained
1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
1 cup ditalini pasta, cooked and drained (about 2 cups)

How to Make It

  • 1

    Heat the oil in a 12-inch skillet over medium heat.  Add the onion and cook until tender, stirring occasionally.  Stir in the red pepper, concentrated broth and spinach.  Cover and cook until the spinach is wilted.

  • 2

    Add the beans, cheese and pasta and toss to coat.

Full Screen View

Why Register?

Becoming a part of Campbell’s Kitchen gives you a lot more tools to get the most out of finding the perfect recipes for you and your family. Here’s what you’ll enjoy once you register:

  • Recipe Recommendations Especially For You – fill out your preferences and Campbell’s Kitchen can start choosing recipes that best fit your lifestyle.
  • Meal-Mail® – sign up and enjoy 7 delicious weekly recipes straight from our kitchen to your inbox. It’s a great way to help you plan for the week ahead.
  • Your own online Recipe Box – a place to save, sort and make notes on all your favorite recipes – and since it’s online you can access it from any computer in the world.
